name: Little Dodgy
description:
This is a simple little game i made for the itcho jam 2018, just for practice.

I decided to make a simple little dodger, the score increases as long as you survive.

CONTROLS

=========================

A/D = Left/Right //Also arrow keys.

Space = Jump 

=========================

All you have to do is get the highest score you can,

every 1000 points it gets harder but drops a power-up that grants  invinsibility for a short time
